about_the_game:
An artbook (and other stuff!) for the visual novel Rain and Respite. Just a lil' extra something for those who want more.

Features

  • Design sheets for all the characters with commentary

  • Development sketches

  • A route guide detailing how choices and endings work

  • Extra dumb stuff like room layouts and little cute drawings in the margins because I got bored

How to Access

After buying this pack, you can access it in the local game directory for "Rain and Respite". Easy way to do this is to right click the game in Steam, then go to Manage, then Browse Local Files.

content_descriptors.notes: This artbook contains depictions of alcohol use, sexual innuendo, revealing clothing, and strong language.
